intro:
The popular "YOU Game" is upgraded!
Let’s combine "YOU" and "YOU" to create a BIG "YOU"!!
description:
The "YOU Game" featured in "KUUKIYOMI 4: Consider It" supports multiplayer and score rankings!

You can enjoy a quick 10 to 20-minute play session and replay as many times as you like!
Of course, you can enjoy this game even if you’re not familiar with the original game it’s based on.

The game rules are simple and easy to understand!
Let’s connect the "YOU" pieces to aim for a bigger "YOU"!
If the "YOU" pieces spill out of the box, it's game over.

To get a high score, connect "YOU" pieces of the same size efficiently.

The game modes are “One Player” and “Two Players”!
"One Player" mode lets you enjoy a solo score attack.
"Two Players" mode, players take turns dropping "YOU".

Support for score rankings has been added for each game mode.
Compete in the score rankings for both “One Player” and “Two Players”!
Compete with "YOU Game" players from all over the world for your score.

Please enjoy the enhanced “YOU Game”!
